description:
Experienced Virginia Law Firm Handling Multiple Practice Areas

For over 30 years, Tucker Griffin Barnes has represented individuals, families, and small businesses in Central Virginia and the Vally. We believe our approach to practicing law provides unique advantages for our clients. When you come to our law firm, you'll find attorneys who have:

1. A Strong Reputation -- We're respected attorneys who live to fight and win for our clients.

2. A Deep Knowledge of the Law -- Expertise matters. Most of our attorneys concentrate their practice in only one or two areas of the law.

3. A Vigorous Commitment To Lower Costs -- We work hard to keep our rates lower than our peers.

4. A Dedicated Focus on Client Service -- We have four convenient office locations (Charlottesville, Palmyra, Harrisonburg and Staunton), promptly return phone calls, provide frequent case updates, provide handicapped accessible parking, and if you're injured, we'll visit you at home, on the weekend or at the hospital.

Remember: The other side doesn't want you to win. We do. Please contact us today for your initial consultation.
